{u'Ref': u'SSHKey'}:
{u'Fn::Base64': {u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#!/bin/bash
', u'# Replace this with your domain
', u'DOMAIN=', {u'Ref': u'InstanceDomainName'}, u'
', u'HOSTNAME=', {u'Ref': u'InstanceHostname'}, u'
', u'IPV4=/usr/bin/curl -s http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/public-ipv4', u'
', u'# Set the host name
', u'hostname', u' ', {u'Ref': u'InstanceHostname'}, u'
', u'echo', u' ', {u'Ref': u'InstanceHostname'}, u'> /etc/hostname
', u'# Add fqdn to hosts file
', u"echo 'HOSTNAME=", {u'Ref': u'InstanceHostname'}, u"'", u'>> /etc/sysconfig/network
', u"echo 'preserve_hostname: true' >> /etc/cloud/cloud.cfg
", u'cat<<EOF > /etc/hosts
', u'127.0.0.1 localhost
', u'$IPV4 $HOSTNAME.$DOMAIN $HOSTNAME
', u'EOF']]}}
